content: liam s beaver liam s beaver is a loveable huggable toy knit in the round although the body is knit in stockinette the tail utilizes linen stitch to create a dense sturdy fabric eyes nose and teeth can be embroidered on or made with buttons fabric felt etc finished size is 16 inches long from nose to tip of tail and 6 inches tall from top of head to floor a photo tutorial on one way to make the teeth can be found on my blog at http //rabbitholekints blogspot com/2012/06/beaver-teeth-photo-tutorial html materials required worsted weight yarn app 150 yards size 4 double pointed needles size 4 circular needle optional darning needle stuffing embroidery thread buttons felt or other embellishment for eyes nose and teeth abbreviations co cast on dpn double pointed needles k knit p - purl kfb knit in the front and the back of the next stitch st stitch sts stitches k2tog knit two stitches together pu pick up create a new stitch from existing work ssk slip next two stitches knit-wise place them back onto left needle and then knit them together through the back loop s1 wyif slip one stitch purl wise with the yarn held in front of the work ls linen stitch 1 special notes cid 1 pattern is written to be knitted using four double pointed needles each needle is separated within the rounds by a long dash -- if using a circular needle instead of dpns please use stitch markers to mark the places where the dpns would begin it is especially important to maintain the point between the beginning of the 1st needle and the end of the 3rd needle cid 1 linen stitch in the round is worked by repeating the following two rounds 1 k1 s1 wyif repeat to end of round 2 s1 wyif k1 repeat to end of round begin at beaver s neck co 44 sts onto 3 dpns 16 12 16 and work the following rounds 1-3 k all sts 4 k1 kfb k2 kfb three times k to end of dpn k all sts k to 11 sts before end kfb k2 three times kfb k1 5-7 k all sts repeat last 4 rounds until there are a total of 84 sts 36 12 36 you may want to switch to a circular needle temporarily at some point during this section due to the number of stitches k all sts for 12 additional rounds then work the following rounds 1 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog three times k to end of dpn k all sts k to 15 sts before end k2tog k2 three times k2tog k1 2-4 k all sts repeat last 4 rounds until there are a total of 36 sts 12 12 12 then work the following rounds 1 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog two times k1 k all sts k1 k2tog k2 k2tog two times k1 2-4 k all sts 5 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog k2 k all sts k2 k2tog
